1.name: 1. Band of Brothers
1.description: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

2.name: 2. Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
2.description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

3.name: 3. The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
3.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

4.name: 4. Six Feet Under
4.description: A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.

5.name: 5. Planet of the Apes
5.description: In 2029, an Air Force astronaut crash-lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.

6.name: 6. Smallville
6.description: A young Clark Kent struggles to find his place in the world as he learns to harness his alien powers for good and deals with the typical troubles of teenage life in Smallville, Kansas.

7.description: Counter Terrorism Agent Jack Bauer races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.

8.name: 8. Scrubs
8.description: In the unreal world of Sacred Heart Hospital, intern John "J.D." Dorian learns the ways of medicine, friendship and life.

9.name: 9. Reba
9.description: Reba McEntire stars as the titular character in this smash sitcom about a single mom of three, navigating life in a Houston suburb.

10.name: 10. Spirited Away
10.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

11.name: 11. Mulholland Dr.
11.description: After a car wreck on Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

12.name: 12. Donnie Darko
12.description: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

13.name: 13. Zoolander
13.description: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

14.name: 14. Not Another Teen Movie
14.description: A sendup of all the teen movies that have accumulated in the past two decades.

15.name: 15. Training Day
15.description: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

16.name: 16. Enterprise
16.description: A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation.

17.name: 17. Legally Blonde
17.description: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen, is dumped by her boyfriend. She decides to follow him to law school. While she is there, she figures out that there is more to her than just looks.

18.name: 18. Black Hawk Down
18.description: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily armed Somalis.

19.name: 19. Le fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain
19.description: Despite being caught in her imaginative world, Amelie, a young waitress, decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey where she finds true love.

20.name: 20. The Fast and the Furious
20.description: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to end it.

21.name: 21. Ocean's Eleven
21.description: Danny Ocean, a gangster, rounds up a gang of associates to stage a sophisticated and elaborate casino heist which involves robbing three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously during a popular boxing event.

22.name: 22. Law & Order: Criminal Intent
22.description: Follows the New York City Police Department's (NYPD) Major Case Squad (MCS), a force of detectives who investigate high-profile murder cases, while also showing parts of the crime from the perpetrator's point of view.

23.name: 23. Hannibal
23.description: Living in exile, Dr. Hannibal Lecter tries to reconnect with now disgraced F.B.I. Agent Clarice Starling, and finds himself a target for revenge from a powerful victim.

24.name: 24. A Beautiful Mind
24.description: A mathematical genius, John Nash made an astonishing discovery early in his career and stood on the brink of international acclaim. But the handsome and arrogant Nash soon found himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery.

25.name: 25. Pearl Harbor
25.description: A tale of war and romance mixed in with history. The story follows two lifelong friends and a beautiful nurse who are caught up in the horror of an infamous Sunday morning in 1941.
